en.guide-enable-simcard-auto-config-mode:
① Press and hold the power button for 3 seconds to turn on the device.
② Single-click the power button to light up the screen.
③ When the screen is on, double-click the configuration button to start activating the device.

zh.guide-enable-simcard-auto-config-mode:
① 长按开关键3秒以开启设备。
② 单击开关键，点亮屏幕。
③ 屏幕点亮状态下，双击配置键开始激活设备。
